#Install guide.

= Introduction =

This document will guide you to install this [http://www.gnome.org/projects/rhythmbox/ rhythmbox ] plugin.


= Details =
==INSTALL:==
copy directory ttplyrics to your ~/.gnome2/rhythmbox/plugins/

==ACTIVE:==
rhythmbox menu-->edit-->plugins-->enable ttplyrics

==USE:==
rhythmbox menu-->view-->TTPlyrics
